task.title: Rename Corpus
task.shortdesc: Rename a corpus in your project.

step.cmd: Right-click (CTRL+click) on the corpus you wish to rename and choose Rename Corpus from the context menu.
step.stepresult: The Rename Corpus window will appear.

step.cmd: Follow the instructions in the Rename Corpus window. If you are unsure whether you want to rename your corpus, click Cancel. To continue and rename the corpus, click OK.
step.stepresult: You will return to the Project Manager window and the corpus will be renamed accordingly.
